entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
